scripts.pug: npx pug-cli -P -o docs/ src/pug/index.pug && npx pug-cli -P -o docs/ src/pug/about.pug && npx pug-cli -P -o docs/ src/pug/datalove.pug
scripts.build: npx pug-cli -o docs/ src/pug/index.pug && npx pug-cli -o docs/ src/pug/about.pug && npx pug-cli -o docs/ src/pug/datalove.pug && npx node-sass --output docs/assets/css --output-style compressed --source-map true --source-map-contents src/sass && npx webpack --mode production --devtool source-map
